title.rendered: Why Hiring an NCSG-Certified Chimney Cleaner Is Essential For Your Austin, TX Home

content.rendered:
Austin, TX is home to many chimney cleaning companies. But, all service providers do not have the same level of resources, skill sets, experience, and certifications. With this being the case, choosing the right chimney cleaning service provider can be a challenging task for you.

Fortunately, there is a simple yet effective way to separate the good from the bad. You can determine whether a company is as good as they claim to be by finding out whether they have an NCSG certification. What exactly is the NCSG certification? Why should you hire an NCSG-certified chimney cleaner? Let us take a look.

NCSG Certification – The Gold Standard in Chimney Cleaning

The National Chimney Sweep Guild (NCSG) is a non-profit organization that focuses on promoting the highest safety standards and best work practices in the chimney and venting industry.

What are the Benefits of Hiring an NCSG Certified Chimney Cleaner?

·        Under Texas law, chimney sweepers do not require any kind of certification. So, if a company is NCSG certified, it means it did so voluntarily to hold itself to the highest standards possible in the industry in terms of quality, safety, and professionalism.

·        In an unregulated industry like chimney cleaning, NCSG certification serves as a marker of credibility. It can make it easier for you to choose the best chimney sweeping company for your home in Austin, TX.

· To get certified by the NCSG, technicians must pass several examinations which are designed to test their knowledge and expertise in chimney cleaning and maintenance. So, when you hire an NCSG-certified chimney cleaner, you can be sure that they are the very best at what they do.

·        NCSG certified technicians need to adhere to a code of ethics. And, should conduct themselves with integrity and responsibility. So, you can trust them to be fair in their dealings with you.

·        NCSG is a non-profit organization that is not driven by monetary interests. It does not issue certificates to all and sundry to make a quick buck. NCSG certification is a privilege that is reserved only for those who meet the highest standards set by the organization.

Choose the Right Chimney Cleaning Company for Your Austin, TX Home

Chimney cleaning is a task that requires a great deal of expertise and training. Dirty chimneys cause fires sometimes. If an untrained or uncertified technician makes a mess of your chimney and fails to clean it properly, your health and well-being – as well as that of your family members – could be at risk.

At United Home Services, we take pride in the fact that we hold ourselves to the highest standards in the industry. All our chimney cleaning technicians are NCSG-certified, insured, and bonded. They have the expertise and experience needed to handle all your chimney-related needs. They also take all the necessary safety precautions to avoid the risk of COVID-19 transmission.

So, if you have any issues with your chimney or if you want to get it professionally cleaned, call us today at 624-494-1164 or contact us online and schedule a free inspection by one of our dedicated NCSG-certified chimney cleaners.
